data.caption: Press Release
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated February 09, 2026, titled "Press Release   Unaudited Financial Results.".

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication for unaudited financials results for quarter ended December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Change in Management
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange about the reappointment of Mr. Srikanth Kodali as the Managing Director of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025.

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Notice of Postal Ballot

data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of  Triveni Banda as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the company w.e.f. January 27, 2026.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Incorporation of a Wholly Owned Subsidiary in the name of  Kapston Home Services Private Limited .

data.caption: Press Release
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding a press release dated January 23, 2026, titled "Press Release on the outcome of the Board meeting held today i.e 23.01.2026. ".

data.caption: Bonus
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange that the Board of Directors at its meeting held on January 23, 2026, have considered and approved bonus at the ratio of 1 : 2, i.e 1 Equity Shares for every 2 Equity Shares held.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Incorporation of a Wholly Owned Subsidiary in the name of  Kapston Home Services Private Limited .

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Kapston Services Limited has informed the Exchange about issue of Bonus Shares in the ratio of 1:2 to the eligible shareholders as on the Record Date (to be determined by the Board and to be intimated to the Exchanges in due course).
